     163             :   /* Type adaptor for scalar values
     164             :    *
     165             :    * Have them behave like infinite arrays of that value
     166             :    *
     167             :    * B is the original type of the broadcast value, and T is the type of the
     168             :    *expression it is combined with
     169             :    * if both B and T are integer types, we choose T instead of B to prevent
     170             :    * automatic conversion into larger types
     171             :    *
     172             :    * That way, np.ones(10, dtype=np.uint8) + 1 yields an array of np.uint8,
     173             :    * although 1 is of type long
     174             :    */
     175             :   template <class dtype, bool is_vectorizable>
     176             :   struct broadcast_base {
     177             :     dtype _value;
     178             :     struct ignored {
     179             :     } _splated;
     180             :     broadcast_base() = default;
     181             :     template <class V>
     182             :     broadcast_base(V v);
     183             :     template <class I>
     184             :     void load(I) const;
     185             :   };
